parameters.param:
$secpasswd = ConvertTo-SecureString "123" -AsPlainText -Force $mycreds = New-Object System.Management.Automation.PSCredential ("julia", $secpasswd)
$postParams = "http://google.com" $url = "http://localhost:9001/httpAuth/app/rest/vcs-roots/DirtyConfigurations_DummyRoot/properties/url" $xml = Invoke-RestMethod -Uri $url -Method Put -Credential $mycreds -Body $postParams Write-Output $xml
